div.h2: Welcome to the CLARIN Metadata Repository
div.p: This repository is one of services on the exploitation side of the CMDI - CLARIN Metadata Infrastructure serving the metadata harvested from all CLARIN Content Providers (TODO: link to list of providers).

The repository is meant primarily as a service, i.e. to be used by other application to search in the data. For this a FCS-compatible REST-API is available as primary mode of access. But there is also a simple HTML-rendition of the REST-API to ease human access.
Any remarks, feedback question at: cmdi@clarin.eu
